fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Quake- (Night) Disrupt a player, randomly redirecting their action to a different target.
Refinement!- (Night) [Cheat] All Cogs except for you gain Basic Defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Quake can redirect a player to visit a Cog.
-Quaked players know they were redirected, but not to whom.
